nodes.text: The mirror illusion was a Fallanassi technique which projected an illusion that varied according to the viewer. The user of the skill gave a general character to the illusion, but the specifics were filled in by the victim's mind. Jacen Solo used a mirror illusion to bring his uncle Luke Skywalker's fear to the surface; Skywalker's mind created the rest of the illusion, viewing first his mother Padmé Amidala and then his wife Mara Jade Skywalker dying.
